attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a member of a band, I find it very hard to get gigs for my band simply because I'm only 15 and it's hard since most venues are for over 18's. 

Also, there's not many places for people to hang out and listen to local new music.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
